mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID ,U.PASSWORD ,U.USE_YN FROM TB_USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT U.* ,B.POINT_BALANCE ,B.POST_KEY FROM TB_USER U INNER JOIN TB_POINT_WALLET B ON U.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NM, U.USE_YN, U.EMAIL, U.BIRTH_DAY, U.NICKNAME, U.GENDER, U.KAKAO_ID, U.APPLE_ID, U.NAVER_ID, U.PHONE_NUMBER, U.PROFILE_IMAGE FROM TB_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickName}
SELECT R.ROLE_NAME FROM TB_ROLE R JOIN TB_USER_ROLE UR ON R.ROLE_ID = UR.ROLE_ID JOIN TB_USER U ON UR.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.PASSWORD, A.EMAIL, A.BIRTH_DAY, A.PHONE_NUMBER, A.USE_YN, A.RECOMMENDER_ID, B.POINT_BALANCE FROM TB_USER A INNER JOIN TB_POINT_WALLET B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY CRE_DT, USE_YN DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (USER_ID, USER_NM, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, RECOMMENDER_ID, USE_YN ,CRE_DT, CRE_ID,UPD_ID) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userNm}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{recommenderId}, 'Y', sysdate(), 'dev01', 'dev01' )

INSERT INTO TB_USER_ROLE (USER_ID, ROLE_ID, CRE_ID, UPD_ID) VALUES( #{userId}, (SELECT B.ROLE_ID FROM TB_ROLE B WHERE B.ROLE_NAME = #{roleName}), CASE WHEN #{creId} IS NOT NULL AND #{creId} != '' THEN #{creId} ELSE #{userId} END, CASE WHEN #{updId} IS NOT NULL AND #{updId} != '' THEN #{updId} ELSE #{userId} END )
INSERT INTO TB_POST_LOG (USER_ID, BLOG_ACCOUNT_ID, TITLE, STATUS, CREATED_AT) VALUES( #{userId}, #{blogAccountId}, #{title}, #{status}, #{createdAt} )
INSERT INTO TB_POINT_HISTORY (USER_ID, AMOUNT, TYPE, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_AT) VALUES( #{userId}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{description}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_POINT_WALLET SET POINT_BALANCE = POINT_BALANCE + CAST(#{deductPoint} AS SIGNED) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND POINT_BALANCE + CAST(#{deductPoint} AS SIGNED) >= 0
